title: Servo Motor
description: This high-torque, precision servo motor is designed for robotics, automation, RC projects, CNC machinery, and DIY electronics. With smooth rotation, fast response, and excellent holding torque, this servo ensures accurate positioning for demanding applications. Whether you’re building a robotic arm, controlling steering in RC vehicles, or integrating automation in a production line, this servo motor delivers consistent performance with minimal noise and heat. ⚙️ Key Features High Precision Control – Ensures accurate angular positioning with minimal error. Durable Build Quality – Constructed with high-strength gears and a reliable housing for long service life. Fast Response Time – Quick start-stop performance ideal for robotics and automation. Wide Compatibility – Works with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, PLCs, and other microcontrollers. Energy Efficient – Low power consumption with excellent torque output. Smooth Operation – Stable performance with minimal vibration and noise. 📐 Specifications (Example – adjust with your exact motor’s specs) Model: Standard 20KG/25KG/30KG Digital Servo Motor (customize as per your motor) Operating Voltage: 4.8V – 7.4V Torque: 20 kg·cm @ 6.0V 23 kg·cm @ 7.4V Speed: 0.16 sec/60° @ 6.0V 0.14 sec/60° @ 7.4V Rotation Angle: 0°–270° (limited) / 360° (continuous models available) Motor Type: Coreless / Brushless (specify yours) Gears: Metal gear (high durability) Connector: Standard 3-pin (PWM signal, VCC, GND) Dimensions: 40 × 20 × 40 mm (approx., depending on model) Weight: ~60 g 🎯 Applications Robotics (arms, legs, joints) RC Cars, Boats, and Aircraft CNC Machines & 3D Printers Smart Automation & IoT Projects Camera Gimbals & Pan-Tilt Mechanisms Educational DIY Kits 📦 What’s in the Box 1 × Servo Motor 1 × Set of Servo Horns (plastic/aluminum) Mounting Screws & Accessories 💡 Why Choose This Servo Motor? Unlike cheaper alternatives, this servo motor is engineered for durability and consistent performance. It’s perfect for both beginners experimenting with Arduino and professionals needing reliability in industrial projects. 🔧 Compatibility Tips Works with most Arduino libraries (Servo.h) and Raspberry Pi PWM libraries. Use an external power supply for high-torque applications. Ensure servo controller or ESC supports required voltage & current. You can always head to the Products for exploring more products.
descriptionHtml:
This high-torque, precision servo motor is designed for robotics, automation, RC projects, CNC machinery, and DIY electronics. With smooth rotation, fast response, and excellent holding torque, this servo ensures accurate positioning for demanding applications. Whether you’re building a robotic arm, controlling steering in RC vehicles, or integrating automation in a production line, this servo motor delivers consistent performance with minimal noise and heat.

⚙️ Key Features

  • High Precision Control – Ensures accurate angular positioning with minimal error.

  • Durable Build Quality – Constructed with high-strength gears and a reliable housing for long service life.

  • Fast Response Time – Quick start-stop performance ideal for robotics and automation.

  • Wide Compatibility – Works with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, PLCs, and other microcontrollers.

  • Energy Efficient – Low power consumption with excellent torque output.

  • Smooth Operation – Stable performance with minimal vibration and noise.

📐 Specifications (Example – adjust with your exact motor’s specs)

  • Model: Standard 20KG/25KG/30KG Digital Servo Motor (customize as per your motor)

  • Operating Voltage: 4.8V – 7.4V

  • Torque:

    • 20 kg·cm @ 6.0V

    • 23 kg·cm @ 7.4V

  • Speed:

    • 0.16 sec/60° @ 6.0V

    • 0.14 sec/60° @ 7.4V

  • Rotation Angle: 0°–270° (limited) / 360° (continuous models available)

  • Motor Type: Coreless / Brushless (specify yours)

  • Gears: Metal gear (high durability)

  • Connector: Standard 3-pin (PWM signal, VCC, GND)

  • Dimensions: 40 × 20 × 40 mm (approx., depending on model)

  • Weight: ~60 g

🎯 Applications

  • Robotics (arms, legs, joints)

  • RC Cars, Boats, and Aircraft

  • CNC Machines & 3D Printers

  • Smart Automation & IoT Projects

  • Camera Gimbals & Pan-Tilt Mechanisms

  • Educational DIY Kits

📦 What’s in the Box

  • 1 × Servo Motor

  • 1 × Set of Servo Horns (plastic/aluminum)

  • Mounting Screws & Accessories

💡 Why Choose This Servo Motor?

Unlike cheaper alternatives, this servo motor is engineered for durability and consistent performance. It’s perfect for both beginners experimenting with Arduino and professionals needing reliability in industrial projects.

🔧 Compatibility Tips

  • Works with most Arduino libraries (Servo.h) and Raspberry Pi PWM libraries.

  • Use an external power supply for high-torque applications.

  • Ensure servo controller or ESC supports required voltage & current.

You can always head to the Products for exploring more products.
